name: Thai Salad with Chickpea Carrot Crumble & Garlic Soy Dressing
description: Thai Salad with Chickpea Carrot Crumble & Garlic Sesame Soy Sauce Dressing. Crunchy Summer Salad with Ginger Chickpea Carrot crumble and garlicky dressing. Use lentils for variation. Add roasted peanut or other nuts. Vegan Gluten-free Recipe
recipeIngredient: salt to taste (1/4 tsp or more depends on if the chickpeas were salted)
a very generous dash of black pepper
Chopped or sliced apple or pear (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Make the chickpea crumble: Pulse the nuts and ginger to break into coarse even mixture, and then add everything else and pulse until crumbly. Taste and adjust salt and spice. You can also add some red curry paste or lemongrass or lime zest into the crumble and mix in..

recipeInstructions.text: Make the dressing: Mix everything under dressing. Taste and adjust to preference.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the dressing: Mix everything under dressing. Taste and adjust to preference.

recipeInstructions.text: Assemble the salad: Toss the lettuce or greens, cucumbers, carrots, apple, cilantro, basil, a good pinch of salt and pepper. Add in the chickpea carrot crumble. Dress liberally with dressing, toss and serve.
